extendedInfo.description: The Ultimate Unit Converter. A unit conversion tool with support for more than 2000 units in 30+ categories including Length, Temperature, Speed, Volume, Weight, Area conversions.**UPDATE** - Fixed screen size bug on bigger phones

reviews.title: Jess Dhillon  (Samsung Glaxy S3)
reviews.comment: Wow what\'s a great work I love this application you can do most of your calculation with this application, thanks a lot and we appreciate your work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.comment: Extremely handy to have around when it\'s needed (surprisingly more often than expected)! Small footprint and negligibly required permissions make this a \"must have\" app for your toolbox! Thanks Dev...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Brilliant!!
reviews.comment: Does What it\'s supposed to do. Keep up the good work.
reviews.author: Alfonso Reyes

reviews.title: best conversion app
reviews.comment: I haven\'t seen a better app with more conversions yet
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Handy to have around!
reviews.comment: Incredibly useful app. I downloaded initially to convert farenheit to celsius, but I have since used it for tons of other daily conversions. I didnt realize it would come in handy this much! Btw, I am a math and science teacher, so I may have more use for the app than others.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The best
reviews.comment: Tried many, love gunit. Simple and easy.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: BHi
reviews.comment: It has everything and so easy to use
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Does what its supposed to.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Does exactly what it\'s supposed to do!

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: There\'s everything you could want & more and it works
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: One of the best converters I\'ve come across. I love the setup where you can see multiple converisons and the wide range of converison types.
reviews.author: Luke Stephens

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Would be perfect and get five stars had a widget been available to do quick conversions such as temp/length/volume been available - hint hint??

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Great , does what is said on the tin!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome

reviews.title: Needs one thing to get 5 stars
reviews.comment: Add a move to SD/USB option please.

reviews.comment: Can\'t move to sd card.

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Nice

reviews.comment: Does not work in landscape mode on droid 2. Ad banner hides the result box so you can\'t see the conversion result

reviews.comment: This was good..but now i cant even open it.. it keeps force closing!! Uninstalling..pointless to keep something that doesnt work!

reviews.comment: Currency exchange rate freezes to often, something is wrong with the server
